titleStmt.title: Helter skelter, or, The Devil upon two sticks in a comical dialogue between high church and low church, relating to the times / by the author of, All men mad.
titleStmt.author: Ward, Edward, 1667-1731.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Ward by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
